Vendor site

Here you find a plenty of options to present your company on our marketplace.

These function are only for our registered vendors available.

Entry in out vendor directory

  • Extend the depiction of your company with maximal {maxbilder} images
  • Vendors / service companies are able to add locations
  • Keyword your entry
  • Listing in categories
  • Options to place news on our marketplace

Options to buy advertisements

Our vendors and registered service companies can release independently adverts on our marketplace.

Extended im- and export functions

Our marketplace gives you the option to import and export a variety of article files on a easy way

  • Export in article-status (new- , active- and expired adverts)
  • Import of any CSV files including images (e. g. from the e-Bay-Shop)
